name: Time Ninja
about: In this endless running game, help Nia Ninja reclaim her clan's lost treasure. Just don't let Jay-the-Jet hit you with his energy blasts. Local 2 player mode allows a 2nd player to control Jay.

name: Streets of Rage 2
about: Side-scrolling beat-em-up. Best version released on Sega Genesis. Also has a great soundtrack.
